a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in countries in which a woman is head of government,
Heads of government are the chief officers of the executive branch of their countries.
World - People living in a countries
where man is head of government
where woman is head of government
World - People living in countries in
Data source: V-Dem (2024); Population based on various sources (2023)
Note: This is recorded on December 31 of each year. V-Dem covers many more countries since 1900.
